thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 46 of 3179
thread.title: Barbara

author: Barbara
title: Barbara
text: This is the way to rent cars in Europe. Excellent prices, choice of vendors, often CDW and theft as well as second driver included in the price. They do charge as soon as you book, but cancellation is easy. The only problem: I could not get the "Amend Booking" button to work--it put me into a loop. So I made a new reservation for my corrected dates and then cancelled the old one.
